# `biwa`

**Usage**: `biwa [-v --verbose…] <SUBCOMMAND>`

**Version**: 0.1.1

- **Usage**: `biwa [-v --verbose…] <SUBCOMMAND>`

## Global Flags

### `-v --verbose…`

Set the verbosity level

Can be used multiple times to increase verbosity (e.g., -v, -vv, -vvv).
By default, only warnings and errors are shown.
-v: info
-vv: debug
-vvv: trace

## Subcommands

- [`biwa run <COMMAND> [COMMAND_ARGS]…`](/cli/run.md)
- [`biwa init [-f --force] [--format <FORMAT>]`](/cli/init.md)
- [`biwa completion <SHELL>`](/cli/completion.md)
